The vok aimed her electric cannon at the ship again, this time 
bringing her machine gun up too.

She found a spot that had been bombed just minutes before. She let it 
all out there.

The shots entered through the cargo bay and down to the engine room. 
The shock was terrible.

Computer: Warning. Critical engine hit. Fusion reactor debalanced and 
protection reduced by 64%. Shielding may hold a maximum of 4 cycles.

Tyrael was stunned. Nothing could have done this much damage and still 
be mounted on any normal transformer. He opened the speakers of all 
the ship.

Tyrael: Attention everyone. Abandon ship. We have sustained critical 
damages. Abandon ship!

Taking a chip out of the computer, he went at the emergency exit at 
the back of the bridge and got out of the ship.

Sanguine saw the blue and white transformer-like being propelled on 
her jets. She knew what she was.

She transformed to her made-up robot mode. It was a tall and sturdy 
one, which would not be easy to take down.

Sanguine: You Vok! I am Reaper! I come for you!

Meteara turned halfway and looked down. It would be a clash to 
remember...
